languages.text: "Буду откровенна, шерин, я уже попыталась убедить Хейнрикса использовать дознавательскую розетту — и добрыми речами, и сладкими песнями. Но он... остается непреклонен, словно обдуваемая ветрами скала. Быть может, с вами дознаватель будет более сговорчив?"

traits.locale_text: "Буду с вами откровенна — я уже пыталась уговорить Хейнрикса использовать инквизиторскую розетту, чтобы нас пропустили. Но он... почему-то отказывается. Возможно, с вами дознаватель будет более сговорчив?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"
languages.original_text: "Буду откровенна, шерин, я уже попыталась убедить Хейнрикса использовать дознавательскую розетту — и добрыми речами, и сладкими песнями. Но он... остается непреклонен, словно обдуваемая ветрами скала. Быть может, с вами дознаватель будет более сговорчив?"

traits.locale_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the wings. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the wings. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the wings. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the wings. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “说实话，亲爱的。我之前试图说服海因里希，让他用审讯官的玫瑰结来帮助我们脱离困境。我尽我所能地甜言蜜语、巧言令色，但他却……完全无动于衷，就像一块石头，完全不在意清风的舞蹈。或许，他会听从你的请求？”
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: “说实话，亲爱的。我之前试图说服海因里希，让他用审讯官的玫瑰结来帮助我们脱离困境。我尽我所能地甜言蜜语、巧言令色，但他却……完全无动于衷，就像一块石头，完全不在意蝴蝶的舞蹈。或许，他会听从你的请求？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Seré sincera, shereen: ya he intentado convencer a Heinrix para que use su insignia de interrogador, con palabras dulces y canciones alegres... pero permanece impasible, como una roca azotada por el viento. Tal vez se muestre más receptivo si se lo pide usted».
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: «Seré sincera, shereen: ya he intentado convencer a Heinrix para que use su insignia de interrogador, con palabras dulces y canciones alegres... pero permanece impasible, como una roca azotada por la marea. Tal vez se muestre más receptivo si se lo pide usted».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シェリーン、正直言うとさ、ハインリックスにインテロゲイターのロゼッタを使ってもらうよう説得したんだよ。うまい言葉と甘い声で褒めそやして持ち上げてさ。でもアイツ…頑として動かないの、翼で岩を叩いてる気分だよ。たぶん、アンタのお願いならもう少し素直に聞いてくれるんじゃない？」
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ダーリン、正直言うとさ、ハインリックスにインテロゲイターのロゼッタを使ってもらうよう説得したんだよ。うまい言葉と甘い声で褒めそやして持ち上げてさ。でもアイツ…頑として動かないの、翼で岩を叩いてる気分だよ。たぶん、アンタのお願いならもう少し素直に聞いてくれるんじゃない？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Pour être tout à fait franche, shereen, j'ai déjà tenté de convaincre Heinrix de se servir de son macaron d'interrogateur, mais j'ai eu beau le prendre par les sentiments, il reste aussi sourd à mes cajoleries qu'une statue de marbre. Peut-être sera-t-il plus ouvert à une requête de votre part ? »
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour être tout à fait franche, shereen, j'ai déjà tenté de convaincre Heinrix de se servir de son macaron d'interrogateur, mais j'ai eu beau le prendre par les sentiments, il reste aussi sourd à mes cajoleries qu'une statue de marbre. Peut-être sera-t-il plus ouvert à une requête venant de vous ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich will ehrlich sein, Shereen, ich habe bereits mit freundlichen Worten und hübschen Liedern versucht, Heinrix zu überreden, seine Inquisitor-Rosette einzusetzen. Aber er ... bewegt sich nicht, wie ein Fels, der von den Winden gepeitscht wird. Vielleicht wird er zugänglicher, wenn Ihr ihn bittet?"
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich will ehrlich sein, Shereen, ich habe bereits mit freundlichen Worten und hübschen Liedern versucht, Heinrix zu überreden, seine Inquisitor-Rosette einzusetzen. Aber er ... bewegt sich nicht, wie ein Fels, den lediglich Flügel berühren. Vielleicht wird er zugänglicher, wenn Ihr ihn bittet?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yalan söyleyeyim şirinim, Heinrix'i Sorgucu rozetini kullanmaya ikna etmeyi çoktan denedim. Tatlı dil döktüm, yalvardım, yakardım. Bana mısın demedi, hiç takmadı. Acaba sen rica etsen razı gelir mi?"
languages.original_text: "I'll be honest, shereen, I already tried to convince Heinrix to use his Interrogator's rosette, with sweet words and pretty songs I cajoled and wheedled. But he... remains unmoved, like a rock whipped by the winds. Perhaps he will be more amenable to a request from you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne yalan söyleyeyim şirinim, Heinrix'i Sorgucu rozetini kullanmaya ikna etmeyi çoktan denedim. Tatlı dil döktüm, yalvardım, yakardım. Bana mısın demedi, hiç takmadı. Acaba sen rica etsen razı gelir mi?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
